text: San Marino participated in the 2010 Summer Youth Olympics in Singapore. The San Marino squad consisted of 4 athletes competing in 4 sports: judo, sailing, shooting and table tennis.http://www.cons.sm/default.asp?id=933&id;_n=1747 ==Judo== ;Individual {|class="wikitable"
